DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue blood patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study assess fibroblast activity patient localize pancreatic cancer undergo surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Fibroblast Activity Patients With Localized Pancreatic Cancer Undergoing Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To assess degree fibroblast activation protein ( FAP ) enzymatic activity tumor site patient localized pancreatic cancer . Secondary - To explore correlation tumor stromal FAP enzymatic activity stromal α_2-antiplasmin level . - To explore correlation tumor FAP enzymatic activity plasma dipeptidyl peptidase plasma α_2-antiplasmin convert enzyme activity potential surrogate . OUTLINE : Patients undergo fine-needle aspiration tumor suspect mass baseline . Tumor sample analyze IHC fibroblast activation protein ( FAP ) expression , immunocapture assay ex vivo FAP enzymatic activity , western analysis FAP concentration . Blood sample collect weekly analyze dipeptidyl peptidase activity ELISA α_2-antiplasmin convert enzyme .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Biopsyproven adenocarcinoma pancreas pancreatic mass suspicious pancreatic cancer Localized disease Scheduled undergo resection exploration pancreatic tumor PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
